text: Club Deportivo Torreperogil is a Spanish football club located in Torreperogil, Jaén, in the autonomous community of Andalusia. Founded in 1975 and refounded in 2008, it currently plays in Tercera División – Group 9, holding home matches at Estadio Abdón Martínez Fariñas, with a capacity of 3,000 spectators. == History == There were different clubs from Torreperogil before, such as UD Perogilense, AD Torres and Sporting de Torreperogil.
